entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
